channel.title: Rating images
channel.description:
I am so sick and tired of people giving lame ass ratings on ugly signatures. There needs to be some sort of Rubric, for people posting their graphics, and people rating them. There should also be a standard rating system based on the average ability of people on this forum. Or possibly different rating systems for different skill levels, which, to judge a skill level, you would ultimatley fill out some area on a rubric you would use to post your images. I may sound like I'm ranting, and I am, but I'm also developing ideas here, if we got more people to offer ideas to this, we could make some sort of organized system of rating.
Ex. - Person posting images to potentially be rated. [code] Time spent with graphics: estimated amount of images made: etc, etc.. [/code]
I just want to seem some order within this graphics board. I see so many ugly images, stolen images, etc. that get ratings like 8/10, 9/10. I want people to recieve real constructive criticism for their artwork, so they can improve. Not Joe shmoe wanting to beef up his post count. So please, support my idea, add to it, and spread my idea around.

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I don’t think that’s the route to go though, I think us being an open community, everyone should be able to rate and give their opinion on the images. As long as they’re guided through the rating process. If that didn’t work, we could always try and get a new Award, or Staff position, that 2 or 3 people would recieve, a brand new subforum for image rating, where the 2 or 3 Raters would give their professional opinions on the images, as well as the rest of the community.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I’m searching the simplemachines.org mods for something. All I can find is giving permissions to view the topic at all, so maybe we could have a board where you can’t even view other topics except for your own. “New permission to allow/deny user from viewing topics other than their own within a board.”

That could work.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

exps35, you know how to do it? There are mod’s that allow the people with certain rights to click on a voting scale. Thats how NSL does it, but I don’t know how they did it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Now this would be asking a bit much, but maybe theres an SMF mod to rate an image out of 10 stars, and only allow certain people access to submit?

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Starblaster100 is trying to make it more important. I still say a select few people should be the ones to rate graphics. None of these children who think they know what their doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Well see, a child board could be done if we push it. I just want my images too be rated correctly, and I don’t want some asshole posting on my topic with some fake randomly chosen number. I want to feel like people know what they’re doing, and will help me with my problems. If we did do this child board thing, it might be a bit too complicated, we’d have to teach everyone all new rules, and it seems a little overboard. Besides Graphics isn’t really MITB’s main field of interest.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Another child board for rating would make more since, with 1-3 people who can rate, people with real talent. You don’t want a bunch of people who have no idea what their doing to rate you, do you? Thats why people go to NSL to get rated, theres some real pros there. A handful of really very talented people should be rating, not new people who make shitty colored blocks of paint.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Well basically, if a moderator EVER comes out of this 3 week discussion between Starblaster and other admins, all you need is a 3 sentence sticky.

“Title: Rating system”
“When rating on a scale from 0 to 10, or any other system, you MUST reply with a reason. Simple as that. No reason and get WARNED.”

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I was just thinking maybe 3 or so pinned topics with guidelines as to how to rate, or what fits under each category. Child boards would require too much, and wouldn’t work out well. If we could work out a good Guidline for everything, such as posting your sigs, etc. We might can’t get this put into action.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I think I get what your saying(or maybe not :))
Ok, so maybe chill boards, for beginners in graphics, for those intermediate, and then the pro’s.
Just an idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I’m just thinking that by having different rating systems for different skill levels will still offer the freedom to rate a 0/10-10/10 but it would be in… ‘Beginner’, ‘Intermediate’, and ‘Pro’. Because when a genuine work of art gets the same rating as a piece of shite that a 12 year old makes. It’s not fair to either user, the newb has nothing to work for, he thinks he’s a pro. While the real Pro is just sitting there dumbfounded at how he got a 9/10 and the 12 year old did too. When I make something, I want the person to rate me truthfully and what I should add, or should remove.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Well this should be added after we get a graphics mod to sticky stuff >:(

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

If you remember the “Rate the user above you”
A mod said “Put a reason, or it’s spam”
I’d guess the same rules would apply…

See if I was into graphics, I’d wouldn’t want people to say

5/10
I want to know why I got a 5, what I could improve with.

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

I agree but its all a matter of oppinion. I like the way casey put it give a rate and comment of why

Read full topic

item.title: Rating images
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Basically people just come here and say 9/10 or w/e.
It’s an easy way for post count.

To the responder: Give a rate, and a commnet of what/why

Read full topic
